articles.description: Max Verstappen leads a Red Bull one-two in qualifying at the Japanese Grand Prix with McLaren's Lando Norris best of the rest.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix 2024: Max Verstappen on pole position for Red Bull

articles.description: England must "demand higher" from each other, says striker Alessia Russo after an underwhelming start to their Euro 2025 qualifying campaign.
articles.title: 'Poor' England must 'demand higher' in Euros qualifying

articles.description: Ander Herrera has won league titles and European trophies, but is chasing his father's dream with Athletic Bilbao.
articles.title: Herrera living out his father's dream in cup final

articles.description: Northern Ireland's Rory McIlroy cards a 70 in the second round of the Texas Open to remain six shots behind leader Akshay Bhatia.
articles.title: Texas Open: Rory McIlroy stays six shots off leader Akshay Bhatia after second round

articles.description: Former Australia captain Michael Hooper says it was "pretty daunting" to make his international sevens debut in his country's 12-0 win against Fiji.
articles.title: Hooper makes Australia sevens debut against Fiji

articles.description: PJ Washington scores with 4.5 seconds left to help the Dallas Mavericks beat the Golden State Warriors 108-106.
articles.title: NBA: PJ Washington leads Dallas Mavericks to win over Golden State Warriors

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from day two of the opening round of the 2024 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship day two - radio & text

articles.description: World number one Ronnie O'Sullivan hits three century breaks in reaching the final of the Tour Championship with a 10-7 win over Gary Wilson.
articles.title: Tour Championship: Ronnie O'Sullivan reaches third final by beating Gary Wilson 10-7 in Manchester

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou says he is not interested in signing players who are only keen to join the club if they qualify for the Champions League.
articles.title: I want people who want to come to Spurs - Postecoglou

articles.description: Scotland's 0-0 draw with Serbia means they have scored only four times in nine games. Once again it poses the question: where are Scotland's goals coming from?
articles.title: Where is Scots' firepower coming from?
